Spa facilities was very nice and inviting
The gym and pool area were beautiful and bijou the executive club amazing the food was fantastic location could not be better but what really makes this hotel is the attitude of the staff
1: But I think the wellness in the Ritz had a nice solarium

I live in a ritz Carlton apartment and have very high expectationsThe Berlin hotel is nicely situated but the carpets in the corridors the smell the terrible gym temporary smell of sweat the service in the main restaurant is not up to the ritz Carlton standards
Late opening of swimming pool spa areaentrance area under construction
If you are a business traveler who picks hotels based upon the quality of the gym do n’t stay at the Ritz Carlton Berlin
